attributes.action: Investigate the Short Selling of HBoS Shares and compensate small share holders
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The HBoS Short Selling by Hedge Funds has significantly devalued the value of it's shares and may have contributed to the sale to Lloyds TSB.  I call upon the government to fully investigate whether illegal trading was involved, prosecute those involved and compensate small share holders who have lost out.
